bug reports : gondre@lma.cnrs-mrs.fr

If s2m.wacom does not work please check that :

A - your OS is 10.6 or later.

B - you're using max 6.0 or later.

C - you installed the appropriate and latest driver from wacom.

D - the tablet is plugged directly to the computer and
    not throught the keyboard neither a usb hub.
